name: Algorithms Notes
body:
These notes are intended for study of the material for COMP3804 at
Carleton University, and should be suitable as the notes for a first course in algorithms.

Assumed knowledge includes: big-Oh, big-Omega, big-Theta.

Topics include:

* Fibonacci numbers
* integer multiplication
* recurrences
* heaps
* selection
* union-find
* graphs
* depth first search
* minimum spanning tree.

Intended topics also include:

* single source shortest path (Dijkstra's algorithm)
* dynamic programming
* complexity classes
* NP-completeness
